page.title: 17Schools. 2
page.content: St. Andrew's now has 210 children with 7 teachers and 1 part-timer. Also on the site is an infant school. {Secondary Schools.}Sir Charles Lucas Comprehensive. A senior teacher's opinion about ujniform was that it is useful to have one based on colour, not style. There are 80 teachres in the school. Punishments are necessary and are part of school life. The 6th-formers run a community centre for old people, while the 4th and 5th years run a play-school. The school uses t.v.s, videos, computers, musical keyboards and science equipment. The Gilberd is a new school. It is out of our area by a few metres, but lots of pupils from our area go to school there. In 1984 there 1200 pupils at the school and about 75 members of staff. The school occupies a site of 24 acres.
